repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: According to the manuscript colophon the text is from the Brahmāṇḍapurāṇa. The Brahmāṇḍapurāṇa edition published by Venkatesvara Steam Press does not include this text. The same manuscript is available in the Wish collection, the digitized manuscripts from this collection are available on the internet archive. This is a part of Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland.

msItem.title: Śriraṅgamāhātmyam

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 22 p. 276, vol. 36 p 112 Wish collection identifier- raswhish49-50.

msItem.incipit: devadevavirupākṣaā śrutaṁ sarvaṁ mayādhunā trailokyāntargataṁ vṛttaṁ tvatmukhāṁbhojanissṛtaṁ |
msItem.explicit:
śṛṇvan paṭhan likhan bibhran
gamāhāmyamuttamaṁ muktvā śubhāśubhe yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṁ padaṁ ||
msItem.colophon: śrīṇaṅganāthārpaṇamastu śrīraṅgamāhātmyaṁ saṁpurṇaṁ௳ hariḥ oṁ śubhamastu ௳ gurubhyo namaḥ ௳

support.p: Only at the beginning there is a guard leaf. Brown thick leaf used as guard.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Very good but the letters are faint.

handNote.desc:
The letters are faint hence the shape of the syllables are not very visible. At the end on
folio, some part of the folio is damaged due to the ink spread.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṁ is written in the left margin of the first folio.
Title śriraṅgamāhātmyam is written in the left margin.
121 is written in pink pencil and 34 is written in blue pencil on the guard folio. And at the end 121 is written in blue and number 34 number seems to be erased.

encodingDesc.p: Question mark used to show illegible letter.

TEI.text:
devadevavirupākṣaā śrutaṁ sarvaṁ mayādhunā trailokyāntargataṁ vṛttaṁ tvatmukhāṁbhojanissṛtaṁ | tathā puṇyāni tirthāni puṇyātvāyatanā
ni ca | gaṁgādyāssaritāssarvā itihāsāśca śaṁkara | kāveryāstvat prasaṁgīnāṁ tasyāstire tvāyā purā
bhate rājyaṁ vaiśvasya dhanasaṁpadaḥ | śudro vi (pi) bhagavat bhaktiṁ yojano vijayo sudhī | garbhīṇi janayet putraṁ kanyāṁ vindati satpatiṁ śṛṇvan paṭhan likhan bibhran
gamāhāmyamuttamaṁ muktvā śubhāśubhe yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṁ padaṁ || iti śribrahmāṇḍapurāṇe māheśvaranāradasaṁvāde śrīraṅgamāmye
daśamodhyayaḥ śrīṇaṅganāthārpaṇamastu śrīraṅgamāhātmyaṁ saṁpurṇaṁ hariḥ oṁ śubhamastu gurubhyo namaḥ
